text: Dɛnkɛlɛyaan xɔn, a yi Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla11.28 Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla: Musaa waxatini, Ala fitina feen nafa nɛn Firawona yamaan ma, malekan yi fa e dii singene birin faxa kɔɛ kedenna ra. Koni, Isirayila kaane yi saraxa wunla xuya e banxine dɛ wudine ma, saya malekan yi dangu e xun ma. Na feen sanla ni ito ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.1-13 kui. yamarine suxu, a wunla xuya banxine dɛɛne ma alogo Halagi Ti Malekan nama Isirayila dii singene faxa.
